name: The Last Vampire
description: The Last Vampire is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival. In this game you have to pass hardcore levels for the evil count Dracula. Your main task is to collect the hearts in the levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space
